value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at what a Power BI tenant is. This is really the Azure Active Directory / Office 365 tenant that contains your users, groups, subscriptions and more.   LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
value.excerpt: Adam look at Power BI build permissions with shared datasets. Taking the mystery out of how you can interact with datasets and know what to do if you can't use it. This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: What the HECK is a Power BI Gateway Cluster?
value.excerpt: Confused about what a Power BI Gateway cluster is? Have your On-Premises Data Gateway installed but it's overloaded? This video is for you! value.title: Can Power BI Transform Your Life at 40? (Or 20 or 60?) #PowerOn Show with Charles & Avi 🔴TalkPowerBI
value.excerpt: Both Charles and I, transformed our lives around 40 years of age. Power BI played a key role and leaving our jobs was a crucial step. But our transformation was a bit deeper than that. We want to share our journey with you, but also ask the important question...is there really a right age to transform

value.title: How to Show Items with No Data in Power BI (e.g. Show All Month Names)
value.excerpt: Sometimes the default behavior in Power BI can be frustrating. For example, if you are showing month names, you may see that if no data is available then those months may not be shown in your Chart or Table. Often, you would want all months (Jan-Dec) to be shown, regardless of whether data is present

value.title: Is This a Good Time to Become a Power BI Consultant? Really? 🤔
value.excerpt: Is this really a good time to become a Power BI Consultant? Becoming an independent Power BI Consultant can be a path to make an impact, do what you love and create a life by your own rules. And surprisingly, some factors may make this the best time to take action. Watch the video to learn more  ➔ Links

value.title: Power BI DAX Measures: Understanding Filter Context using DATESYTD Example (I.C.A.N. Rule)
